title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 43.2 - Schedule of State transportation assistance expended
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 43.2 - Schedule of State transportation assistance expended

State Regulations

For its fiscal years commencing after December 31, 2000, the
municipality or public authority shall prepare either: (a) a supplementary "schedule of State
transportation assistance expended" which shall include the following: (1)
the name of the municipality or public
authority; (2)
the period covered
by the schedule; (3)
the title of
the State transportation programs funded; and
(4)
the amounts actually expended during the
period identified under the State Transportation Program; or
(b) in lieu of the supplementary
"schedule of State transportation assistance expended," a combined
supplementary "schedule of expenditures of Federal awards and State
transportation assistance expended," which includes the information set forth
in paragraphs (a)(1)-(4) of this section. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
43.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
